body_html:
@xiaowenhe Based on your below screenshot, Tensorflow is only able to find CPU device not the gpu device. You can do following things to fix this:

1. Make sure tensorflow is compile with cuda (My suspicion is here)
2. Try running nvidia-smi to see if you have compatible GPU and your driver works
body:
@xiaowenhe Based on your below screenshot, Tensorflow is only able to find CPU device not the gpu device. You can do following things to fix this:

**1. Make sure tensorflow is compile with cuda (My suspicion is here)**
2. Try running nvidia-smi to see if you have compatible GPU and your driver works

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9772589/40015241-82c5c7d8-5767-11e8-9558-d081ffd9f086.png)
